name: Avengers
full_text: Do you plan to see @Marvel’s The #Avengers this Memorial Day weekend? Watch this new TV spot: http://t.co/JiC84kuD

name: Avengers
full_text: Check out the latest TV spot for @Marvel’s The #Avengers: http://t.co/Y1ibgosg RT if you’re seeing #Avengers today!

name: Avengers
full_text: It’s official! On May 1, 2015, the Avengers assemble again in the sequel to @Marvel's The #Avengers! http://t.co/H6MrKBDA Excited yet?!

name: Mark Ruffalo
full_text: Thanks Canada and Toronto! We had a great time. Enjoy the @Avengers.

full_text: @diego20seron  I have been sworn to secrecy when speaking about the Avengers.  I can say I had a great time shooting it and recreating Hulk.

name: Avengers
full_text: Sounds like a world record attempt in the making. RT @frempas: I could watch The Avengers ( @Avengers ) 1,000x in a row. #MARVELous

full_text: @JRennersArms Ha!!! I'm a huge Fan. Do you know anything about the Avengers? Please Pretty Please?

name: Avengers
full_text: Only 4 more times? Well...okay. RT @Isaacrwar: The #Avengers was too sick! I need to see it 4 more times.

name: Mark Ruffalo
full_text: @brianalvey The Avengers, fight for the common good. They fight for the working man. They fight for truth and Justice and law. They love me.

name: Avengers
full_text: Thanks for assembling! RT @Lovely_Hooligan: Going to the avengers on Saturday for the sixth time! :) #cantgetenough #theavengers #Avengers

full_text: “@SenniiZ: @Mruff221 Yesterday i watched The Avengers in Thailand oh Mark I LOVE YOU ! #ThaiFansloveyoutoo” Thanks Thailand!
